snippet.title: Citadel 1.3 Remonstered performance on Amiga 3000
snippet.description:
This is the latest Citadel 1.3 "Remonstered" version running on a real Commodore Amiga 3000 with MC68030 (25MHz and 30MHz).

The gameplay capture is done off the Amiga monitor so not great quality, but we wanted to show how it runs on real HW (emulator timings are a bit different). The top number on the left is FPS.

See the A1200 performance video for more details and links: 
https://youtu.be/liLFG8tTwmA
A500 performance:
https://youtu.be/e-cNskzcE0E
